- WAS 7: Flask + Gunicorn (Python)
- WAS 8: Go + Fiber
- Redis Cluster (6 nodes)
- Kafka Cluster (3 nodes with KRaft)
- Observability stack: Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger, Loki
- Kubernetes manifests for Docker and containerd runtimes
- GitLab CI/CD pipeline
